name: The Polluters
startIntroPart2: The nation that terror the rest!!
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be assimilated!
attacked: You want to play? Very funny!
defeated: How is it possible that those Humans hurt us? The galactic senate will take care of them.
introduction: As superior galactic entities, you are not worthy of our attention.
neutralYes: That is very good from you nice person.
hateHello: Nope i hate you but could potentialy fear you?
hateNo: We are way too good for that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
